description:
This course covers all AP Macroeconomic curriculum. Practice makes perfect! In this course, I will walk you through over 300 + exam questions so you know exactly what to expect on the real exam! This course will give you more than a fighting chance in getting a full mark on your exam. This course is composed of 80% walk through videos on concepts and exam problems, 20% on exam problems documents.

You should devote at least 3 months to this course. To get the most out of this course, you should do the followings for each session:

1) Read a chapter/section of an AP Macroeconomic Test Prep Book (for example, production possibilities curve and trade)

2) Go over the same session on this course (this course aims to go over the concepts and theories by going over example test problems)

3) Do the practice problem set at the end of each session (re-reinforce all the test skills you have learned in this course)

4) Go over all the walk through on the practice problem set (reassurance and gain confidence)

This course is also suitable for students enrolling in First Year Macroeconomic course and this course will give you a boost in your grade at college.
title: Become a Master in AP Marcoeconomics
